channel.title: Less laggy? omg how? [pi 317]
channel.description: how would i make my Pi 317 less laggy?.... because after i added my code for deleting quest's off quest tabs, it became more laggy...

item.title: Less laggy? omg how? [pi 317]
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

Replace the code you posted, with the code I posted (modified for your server of course). You will need to define an int[] for the questIds, but like I said, this might not change the lag, if you're doing it every time there's an event to be processed.

so do i add this onto playerhandler.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Less laggy? omg how? [pi 317]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:431580”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=534258.msg3906058#msg3906058 date=1328234577]
LOL that’s why. you added a bunch of extra un-needed code to the server.
Use what Zyle showed you, it should reduce lagg.
[/quote]

Only if it’s called once. However, his server might execute that code every time the server ticks (which results in a lot of wasted resources).[/quote]
Usually(hopefully) they add it into the abstract method which handles the player logging in.

Read full topic

item.title: Less laggy? omg how? [pi 317]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Army123, post:6, topic:431580”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=534258.msg3906046#msg3906046 date=1328234125]

how would i make my Pi 317 less laggy?.. because after i added my code for deleting quest’s off quest tabs, it became more laggy…

Then something you changed made it more laggy.

Did you do something like

for (int i = 0; i < questIds.length; i++) {
    c.sendString("", questIds[i]);
}

[/quote]

so where do i add this?[/quote]

Replace the code you posted, with the code I posted (modified for your server of course). You will need to define an int[] for the questIds, but like I said, this might not change the lag, if you’re doing it every time there’s an event to be processed.

Read full topic

item.title: Less laggy? omg how? [pi 317]
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:431580”][quote author=Army123 link=topic=534258.msg3906044#msg3906044 date=1328234038]
how would i make my Pi 317 less laggy?.. because after i added my code for deleting quest’s off quest tabs, it became more laggy…
[/quote]

Then something you changed made it more laggy.

Did you do something like

for (int i = 0; i < questIds.length; i++) { c.sendString("", questIds[i]); } [/quote]

so where do i add this?

Read full topic

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:431580”]LOL that’s why. you added a bunch of extra un-needed code to the server.

Only if it’s called once. However, his server might execute that code every time the server ticks (which results in a lot of wasted resources).
